events.name: Colorado Avalanche at New Jersey Devils

headlines.description: — Jack Hughes scored at 1:53 of overtime and Jake Allen made 21 saves and the New Jersey Devils slipped past the Colorado Avalanche 4-3 for their eighth straight win.
headlines.shortLinkText: Jack Hughes scores in OT and Devils extend win streak to 8 with 4-3 victory over Avalanche

events.name: Vegas Golden Knights at Tampa Bay Lightning

headlines.description: — Nikita Kucherov scored 33 seconds into overtime and the Tampa Bay Lightning beat the Vegas Golden Knights 2-1 on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Kucherov scores in OT to give Lightning 2-1 win over Golden Knights

events.name: San Jose Sharks at Minnesota Wild

headlines.description: — Macklin Celebrini scored an unassisted goal at 3:47 of overtime to give the San Jose Sharks a 6-5 victory over the Minnesota Wild on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Macklin Celebrini scores in overtime to lift Sharks past Wild, 6-5

headlines.description: — Dylan Guenther broke a tie with 5:36 left and the Utah Mammoth won their seventh straight game, beating the Winnipeg Jets 3-2 on Sunday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Guenther breaks late tie, Mammoth beat Jets 3-2 for 7th straight victory

events.name: Los Angeles Kings at Chicago Blackhawks

headlines.description: — Alex Laferriere and Kevin Fiala scored in a 1:25 span early in the second period, Anton Forsberg stopped 22 shots and the Los Angeles Kings beat the Chicago Blackhawks 3-1 on Sunday night
headlines.shortLinkText: Laferriere and Fiala score in 2nd-period burst to back Forsberg in Kings' 3-1 win over Blackhawks

headlines.description: — Mikko Rantanen scored the tiebreaking goal midway through the third period, and the Dallas Stars rallied to beat the Nashville Predators 3-2 on Sunday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Rantanen gets tiebreaking goal in 3rd period as Stars rally from two goals down, beat Predators 3-2

events.name: New York Rangers at Calgary Flames

headlines.description: — Blake Coleman scored twice and the Calgary Flames beat the New York Rangers 5-1 on Sunday to snap an eight-game skid.
headlines.shortLinkText: Coleman scores 2 as Flames beat Rangers 5-1 to end eight-game skid
